title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: Mr. Greenshields saw Sir Walter again in Clydesdale

title: The Scottish cavalier;
author: Grant, James
snippet: " How are you back so soon, Hab P By my faith, I thought you were browbeating the westland Whigs, and roistering at free quarters among the stiffnecked carles of Clydesdale."

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: While this Avild scene was being transacted at Holyrood, to befolloAved almost immediately at London by the Revolution and theflight of the King, there Avas beginning to run about, among the Leadhills at the head of Clydesdale, a little merry-ej'ed boy Avho was toexert a far-spreading influence on the capital and on Scotland.
